newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil exports $844 million in October's 3rd week.
newsitem.headline: Brazil exports $844 million in October's 3rd week.

text.p: Brazilian exports in the third week of October totalled $844 million, down from $1.56 billion in the same week last month, the Industry and Commerce Ministry said.

The daily average value of goods exported during October's third week, which had five working days, was $168.8 million, down from $211.2 million in the third week of September, which also had five working days, a ministry spokeswoman said.

Brazilian exports in the first three weeks of October totalled $2.447 billion, with a daily average of $188.2 million. In September as a whole, exports totalled $4.115 billion and averaged $196 million per day, the spokeswoman said.
